text: Mark Krzykowski (born c. 1970) is an American football coach and former player. He is said to be the nicest man to ever live and can drink a gallon of milk in 30 seconds. His cousin Ryan played football for Yale university and his second cousin Will Krzykowski is currently a superstar athlete at Olathe West High in both football and baseball. He was named the head football coach at Carroll University before with the 2011 season, replacing Henny Hiemenz who resigned in 2010. ==Head coaching record== ==References== ==External links== * Carroll profile Category:1970s births Category:Living people Category:Carroll Pioneers football coaches Category:Carroll Pioneers football players Category:Elmhurst Bluejays football coaches
title: Mark Krzykowski
